mapper.select: SELECT t_user.user_id, user_name, wechat_number, phone_number, user_photo, sex, t_user.location_id, longitude, latitude, location_description FROM t_participate,t_user,t_location WHERE t_participate.activity_id = #{id} AND t_participate.user_id=t_user.user_id AND t_user.location_id=t_location.location_id;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_participate WHERE t_participate.activity_id=#{activityId} AND t_participate.user_id=#{userId};
